sources.title: They Call Me Trinity (1970) The right hand of the devil - Terence Hill & Bud Spencer Western Film 4K
sources.description:
He Was On the Side of the Law and Order. He Was On the Side of Crime and Chaos. He Was On Any Side That Would Have Him.
When Trinity, the lazy gunslinger with a lightning-quick draw, teams up with his hulking brawler brother Bambino, they saddle up to outwit tyrannical Major Harriman a Mexican bandit, and his henchmen. When the brothers expose Major Harriman's plot to seize a pacifist settlement’s land, the Major threatens annihilation, the brothers rally the settlers, using fists, trickery, and Sarah’s sharpshooting to ambush his forces—culminating in a brawl where Bambino’s brute strength and Trinity’s speed turn the tide.


They Call Me Trinity (1970) Original title: Lo chiamavano Trinità...

Director: Enzo Barboni (as E.B. Clucher)
Writers: Enzo Barboni

Main cast:
Terence Hill – Trinity (“The Right Hand of the Devil”)
Bud Spencer – Bambino (“The Left Hand of the Devil”)
Steffen Zacharias – Jonathan
Dan Sturkie – Tobias
Farley Granger – Major Harriman
Gisela Hahn – Sarah
Elena Pedemonte – Judith

Genres: Spaghetti Western, Comedy, Parody
Release date: December 22, 1970 
Filming location: Italy

NEXT film in the series: Trinity Is Still My Name (1971) https://youtu.be/3z4L3Iq7Sfk

metadata.Plot: A drifter comes to town where his brother is sheriff. His brother is actually a robber who broke the real sheriff's leg and left him for dead, and became sheriff in order to hide out. They team up against the local land baron who is trying to get rid of the Mormon settlers in a valley he wishes to own.
metadata.Actors: Terence Hill, Bud Spencer, Steffen Zacharias
